casebody.data:
Jesse ROSENBLUM, Plaintiff-Petitioner,
v.
BOROUGH OF CLOSTER, Defendant-Respondent,
and
Beverly Ann Watkins, Defendant. C-589 September Term 2017
079783 Supreme Court of New Jersey. February 09, 2018

To the Appellate Division, Superior Court:

A petition for certification of the judgment in A-000097-15 having been submitted to this Court, and the Court having considered the same;

It is ORDERED that the petition for certification is denied, with costs.
